question:
Give the expected product(s) of the reaction of 1-pentanol with each of the following reagents.

(a) $K^{+-}OC(CH_3)_3$

(b) Sodium metal

(c) $CH_3Li$

(d) Concentrated $HI$ 

(e) Concentrated $HCl$ 

(f) $FSO_3H$

(g) Concentrated $H_2SO_4$ at 130°C 

(h) Concentrated $H_2SO_4$ at 180°C 

(i) $CH_3SO_2Cl, (CH_3CH_2)_3N$ 

( j) $PBr_3$ 

(k) $SOCl_2$ 

(l) $K_2Cr_2O_7 + H_2SO_4 + H_2O$ 

(m) $PCC, CH_2Cl_2$ 

(n) $(CH_3)_3COH + H_2SO_4$ (as catalyst)
